sentences.english: I started teaching ESL part-time (English as a Second Language) in 2003.
sentences.chinese: 当作兼职，我从2003年开始教非母语英语课程。

sentences.english: it's like you know English as well as your first language.
sentences.chinese: 看起来你对英语的了解就像你的母语一样了。

sentences.english: We strongly support education in our own mother tongues.
sentences.chinese: 极力支持争取接受母语方言教育的权利。

sentences.english: Project only for those, who have Suomi as mother language.
sentences.chinese: 只对那些项目，谁作为母语芬兰语。

sentences.english: The role of the mother tongue in FLL has caught much attention of researchers.
sentences.chinese: 母语在外语学习中的作用一直备受关注。

sentences.english: Secondly, the English teaching methods has positive significance for improving the mother-tongue language teaching.
sentences.chinese: 其次，英语教学方法对改进母语教学具有积极的意义。

sentences.english: Because you don't know his language.
sentences.chinese: 因为你不会说他的母语。

sentences.english: The study of a foreign language has always been affected and interfered by the thought rooted in the native language.
sentences.chinese: 母语固有文化的思维直接影响和干扰了外语的学习。

sentences.english: transferring those grammatical skills  if you're coming from another language.
sentences.chinese: 母语和英语之间语法技巧的转换。

sentences.english: Actually there are more non-native speakers than you think.
sentences.chinese: 实际上在美国的非母语者要比你想象的多。

sentences.english: "Non-mother tongue writing" is a concept set forth by the writer.
sentences.chinese: “非母语写作”是笔者所提出的一个概念。

sentences.english: This will not be penalised if it does not affect communication。
sentences.chinese: 如果这些母语特征并不影响整体交流将不会被扣分。

sentences.english: That was when I started looking deeper at the real meaning of teaching ESL.
sentences.chinese: 从那时开始我对教非母语英语课程的意义看的更深了。

sentences.english: Maybe this is already her mother tongue.
sentences.chinese: 也许这先前就是她的母语。

sentences.english: Spanish is an official language on four continents and is the mother tongue in 21 countries.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙语是四大洲21个国家的母语和官方语言。

sentences.english: Even native English speakers commonly make this error.
sentences.chinese: 即使母语是英文的人都常犯下这种错误。

definition: Mandarin (common language)/Putonghua (common speech of the Chinese language)/ordinary speech
English Language Teaching (ELT)/studying and teaching English
